attributes.long-description:
Tiny Troopers Joint Ops is an epic bite-sized arcade shooter, filled to the brim with action-packed mini maps of mayhem!

Take on the Zombie hoard in the Zombie Campaign DLC, exclusive to PlayStation®!

Switch between PS3™, PS4™ and PS Vita Cross-Save functionality.

Tiny Troopers, it’s miniature warfare on a massive scale!

Purchasing this content entitles you to the PS3™ system, PS4™ system, and “PS Vita” system versions!

1GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function
Cross Platform Features PS4™ - PS Vita
HD Video Output 720p,1080i,1080p

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.  This account may download item to up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems and 2 PS3™ systems activated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.

© 2015 Kukouri Mobile Entertainment Ltd. Developed by Kukouri Mobile Entertainment Ltd., and Epiphany Games. Licensed to and published by Wired Productions Ltd. Kukouri, Tiny Troopers and the Tiny Troopers logo are trademarks of Kukouri Mobile Entertainment. All rights reserved.
attributes.name: Tiny Troopers Joint Ops Complete Bundle
